Walkthru Bldg 1 - 39975

(and areas nearby)

Sunday, July 21, 2001

I’m including everything I found during the walkthroughs including "long-term" projects. I’ll indicate these as LT (indicating they won’t get fixed immediately and might need board approval, but nevertheless good things to get on our radar if not already). Sometimes I’ll indicate "north", "east", etc, stairways. This of course is relative to the building itself (and I apologize for not specifying to the level of, say, "northwest").

This walkthrough generally encompasses routine inspections of the immediate grounds inside and outside the building. It covers tasks that maintenance and/or janitorial staff should be able to fix. It does not cover tasks that we are not qualified to make any comments about, since we are not licensed professionals, or might in any way compromise our safety: assessing elevator reliability, determining if fire extinguishers are working properly, etc. All we can do in these cases is indicate a potential problem.

- David Epstein

Area between bldg 1 and 4:
  • Need to sweep up flower droppings on tiles between Cedar Blvd. sidewalk and gate entrance.
  • Remove four Food4Less carts.
  • Air pump on the gate isn’t working.
  • Sweep up tiles near the fountain area.
  • (LT) A few cracked tiles near the fountain
  • Slightly raised concrete slabs near the new bench. Should have someone check it out. Also a cracked tile nearby.
  • Fountain needs to be cleaned.
  • Fountain isn’t working.

Entrance of bldg 1 (39975):
  • Remove three Food3Less carts outside.
  • (LT) Cracked tiles near the sidewalk
  • Chandelier light burnt out
  • Left entrance lamp light under tree is burnt out. Tree should be trimmed away from the bulb.
  • Slightly dirty near the intercom.
  • (LT) Clean sandstone in front and along the sides.
  • (LT) Interior handles of entrance door severely scratched.
  • Trash can overfilled near elevator.
  • (LT) Elevator & brown side panel needs painting.
  • (LT) Graffiti scratches on inside door of elevator.

Interior stairs area (all floors):

  • 3rd floor sign is slightly damaged and needs to be refastened to the door.
  • 3rd floor fluorescent light burnt out.
  • Scratch marks on brown railing.
  • A few spots on the rugs.
  • Graffiti on interior of 2nd floor door.
  • Dirty interior side of 1st floor door.
  • Some dirt on walls between 1st & 2nd floors.
  • Some dirt on walls on 1st floor.
  • (LT) Exteriors of 1st & 2nd floor doors scratched.

Lobby and fountain areas 1st floor:

  • (LT) Dirt on sandstone columns near the elevator. Also, some of the sandstone is chipped.
  • Burnt out wall light near interior fountain
  • Fountain needs to be clean.
  • Fountain not working.
  • (LT) Grime on sandstone near fountain gate.
  • Clean up 39975 light just outside of fountain gate.

1st floor hallways:

  • A few spots on rug in front of 143.
  • All fluorescent lights are dirty dirty dirty!
  • Some dirt on wall near 137.
  • Interior wooden door (with magnet) can’t close, between the elevator and 137.
  • Couple of streaks on rugs near 133.
  • Scratches on interior wooden doors near 134.
  • Air pumps don’t work too well on these same wooden doors.
  • Cobwebs over exterior lights outside the glass door which faces the pool.
  • Straighten out floor rug near north exit glass door.
  • A few carpet stains in that area.
  • Doors of 133 and 134 are dirty.
  • Bottom plug outlet near 138 – plug gets stuck
  • Plug near 135 & fire extinguisher – a little out of place.

2nd floor hallways:

  • Carpet stain near 229.
  • Carpet stains and dirt near 232.
  • All dirty fluorescent lights.
  • Window areas facing the pools are dirty, particularly bottom wood frame.
  • Need screens.
  • Metal frames around windows are dirty or have white paint on them.
  • Minor scratches & pealing on interior wooded doors.
  • Carpet stains near 233.
  • Scratches on exterior of door of 233.
  • Stains near 235.
  • Some paint on tiles in alcove area near 237.
  • Dirty window facing Cedar (near elevator).
  • Dirty wood basin in this window area.
  • Top of ashtray unscrewed.
  • Chipped brown paintwork around exterior of elevator.
  • Carpet stains near 239.
  • (LT) Sandstone getting a bit dirty in alcove areas.
  • Footprint impressions near 243 (I think they belong to some human).
  • Scratch on exterior handle of glass door (southwest exit).
  • Bottom plug near 240 gets stuck when plugged in.
  • Bottom plug near elevator is cracked.
  • Plug near 233 needs to be refastened.

3rd floor hallways:
  • Slight stain on attached matt near glass door (north side)
  • Small carpet stains in front of 331 & 332.
  • Dirty wood basins in window area, facing the pool.
  • Dirty middle screen in this area.
  • Left & right windows need screens.
  • A couple of torn rug strands alongside 333 area.
  • Carpet stains near 336.
  • Tiles slightly dirty in alcove areas near 337.
  • Between rug and tiles near the elevator. Get someone to smooth this out!
  • Scratches on exterior woodwork of elevator.
  • (LT) Sandstone near elevator is dirty.
  • Need screen on large window facing Cedar?
  • Stain near 338.
  • Graffiti on brown woodwork near 338.
  • Light burnt out in alcove area near 339.
  • All fluorescent lights are dirty.
  • Exterior handle of exit door scratched (south side).
  • Bottom plug near 333 gets a little stuck.
  • Streak marks on wall etween 337 and elevator. Also near 338.
  • Bottom plug near 340 gets stuck.

Exterior stair areas North side (all floors):

1st à 2nd floor area:

  • Stairs need to be cleaned (and concrete area beneath the stairs)
  • Scratched brown railing
  • Cobwebs
  • Dirty fluorescent light.
  • Burnt out fluorescent light on 2nd floor.
  • Gum on tiles on 2nd floor.
  • Scratched handle on exterior of 2nd floor flass door.

2nd à 3rd floor area:

  • Some white paint on exterior 3rd floor railing.
  • Grime on stairs.
  • Some dirty tiles
  • (LT) Chipped cement on 2nd to last stair before reaching the 3rd floor.

Exterior stair areas South side (all floors):

1st à 2nd floor area:

  • Clean up concrete part under the 1st floor stair.
  • Clean up bulletin board area near the glass door.
  • Tiles are filthy on 1st floor area.
  • Stairs are filthy between 1st & 2nd floor.
  • Brown railing is dirty and has white paint on it.
  • Metal balcony grids between 1st & 2nd floor are dirty.

2nd à 3rd floor area:

  • 2nd floor tiles somewhat dirty.
  • Grime on railing btwn 2nd & 3rd floors. Particularly the last part, right side, near the 3rd floor.
  • Stairs slightly dirty between 2nd & 3rd floors.
  • Tiles somewhat dirty on 3rd floor.
  • One fluorescent light burnt out between 2nd & 3rd floor.
  • Fluorescent lights are filthy.

Areas Between Bldg 1 and 2:

Entrance:

  • Filthy sandstone, right lower side (also on bldg 2), near the gate.
  • Dusty handle areas of exterior gates
  • Chandeliers burnt out.

Fountain area:

  • Fountain needs to be cleaned.
  • Fountain not working.
  • Right lamp light (bldg 1 side), near the fountain, is burnt out.

Near pool area:

  • We need a light near the 3 palm trees just outside the south railing of the pool.
  • Clean concrete walkway near the pool.
  • Ground tree light near the 39975 sign on bldg 1, is burnt out.
